1912.answer: Relevant answer: "To cure depression, it is important to consider various treatment options. One potential treatment discussed in the podcast is the use of EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid). Studies have shown that taking sufficient doses of EPA can help with depression relief, and some individuals may be able to reduce their dosage of SSRIs or even avoid antidepressant medication altogether. It is crucial to consult a professional before making any changes to medication and not to take mental health issues lightly."
